Entry.EnglishText: There are tales of old about the <Blue>Power of Shade<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: おれも昔、じいちゃんやばあちゃんから たくさん昔話を聞いたもんだなぁ。
Entry.EnglishText: Back in the day, I used to hear all sorts old tales from my grandparents.

Entry.JapaneseText: うわぁー、それどんな話？ すっごく聞きたいんですけど？
Entry.EnglishText: Wow, really? What kinds of stories? You've got me really wanting to hear them!

Entry.JapaneseText: よっしゃ！ 聞かせてしんぜよう！
Entry.EnglishText: Okay, I'll have to tell them to you!

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、たくさんあるからなぁ。
Entry.EnglishText: But there are so many of them...

Entry.JapaneseText: あとでよりすぐりのを聞かせてやるぜ。 楽しみにしてな。
Entry.EnglishText: I'll make sure to tell you the best one I've got sometime later. You'd better be looking forward to it.
